participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, with a deep appreciation for art and beauty.
participant_1.background: I spend my day making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents. My family is very supportive of my writing. I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record. I couldn’t live without my cell phone. My father worked 11 hours a day.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and analytical, with a penchant for storytelling and a love for the whimsical.
participant_2.background: My biggest challenge was having to work from home and not being able to interact with my colleagues in person. I am a software engineer who loves Halloween and pasta. I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic. I have always enjoyed telling stories to people. I am afraid of clowns.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer, and I love it! What about you?
I'm a potter, and I love it too! It's so cool that we have similar interests. What's your favorite thing about being a software engineer?
I love the creative aspect of it. I also love the fact that I can work from home. What's your favorite thing about being a potter?
I love the creative aspect of it too! I also love the fact that I can make something beautiful out of clay.
That's so great! I'm glad that we both enjoy our jobs.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who understands the creative process.
Me too! I feel like I can really relate to you.
I feel the same way. I'm glad we met!
Me too! Maybe we can collaborate on a project sometime.
That would be so cool! I'd love to do that.
